A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie failed in so many ways. But face it\, there's a new audience out there that will carry this movie to box office success. Storyline was could have been better\, Carrie Fishers character finally was shown using the force in a ridiculous unbelievable way. So much more i could go on\, but I'll let the generous 2 star review speak for itself. Sad end to a franchise that will now be exploited for years to come. George Lucas is not happy i can imagine. Hope the 2 bIllion dollar's was worth selling your company Sir George.
